snippet.title: Unhack/Unhack:Destruction Trailer
snippet.description:
New trailer for Unhack along with Unhack:Destruction--three episodes' worth of additional content.

Unhack is a visual novel x puzzle game. Combat the 5K Worm alongside fully voiced AI companions! Unhack's tale explores the nature of greed behind a light hearted surface. The game features the voice of Xanthe Huynh, whose voice can also be heard in K-On!, Sword Art Online, Atelier Meruru and many more.

Unhack:Destruction is a three episode prequel that revolves around A2 and her creator, Mrs Director. The game also contains a brand new character, Proto A. She is voiced by Kimlinh Tran. Her voice can also be heard in Dust: An Elysian Tail, Rival Threads, Skullgirls among other titles.

Find out more about the game here:
http://unhack.invertmouse.com

Unhack can also be purchased from Shinyloot:
http://www.shinyloot.com/unhack?ref=85117a602ce6946ec9009670ec033adb

Unhack needs your help on Steam Greenlight. Thank you for your support:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=165693317

Please consider staying up to date by liking my Facebook page:
http://facebook.com/invertmouse

And/or Twitter: @InvertMouse

Thank you!
